named-query.name: BC_READ_ENC_ORDER_ITEM_DTO_BY_ID
named-query.query: SELECT item FROM com.enclothe.core.dm.order.domain.EncOrderItemDTOImpl item WHERE item.id = :id

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_CUSTOMER_ORDER_ITEM_DTO_BY_SESSION_ID
named-query.query: SELECT item FROM com.enclothe.core.dm.order.domain.EncOrderItemDTOImpl item WHERE item.sessionId = :sessionId ORDER BY item.creationDate desc

named-query.name: BC_READ_ACTIVE_CUSTOMER_ORDER_ITEM_DTO_BY_IP
named-query.query: SELECT item FROM com.enclothe.core.dm.order.domain.EncOrderItemDTOImpl item WHERE item.ipAddress = :ipAddress ORDER BY item.creationDate desc
